the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home," Mr. Mike Pence wrote in the letter. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. "We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile." Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
